CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6+6-3-c - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Criminal proceedings;Article 6-1 - Fair hearing) (Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Article 6-3-c - Defence through legal assistance)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE Tagil .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of PERSON convicted the applicant of massive fraud , an offence punishable with up to CARDINAL years’ imprisonment , and sentenced him to DATE in prison .
CARDINAL . During the trial the applicant was represented by his counsel .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged an appeal .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment on appeal . It follows from the appeal judgment that the applicant could follow the appeal hearing by video link from the PERSON remand prison IZ-CARDINAL/CARDINAL . Counsel and prosecutor did not attend the hearing .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was placed in PERSON remand prison IZ-CARDINAL/CARDINAL and was held there until DATE . According to the applicant , conditions of detention there were inhuman and degrading because of overcrowding .
